policy.title: PolyGo Data Privacy Policy
policy.intro: We take your privacy seriously. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

commitment.title: Privacy Commitment
commitment.content: PolyGo is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. We comply with current data protection regulations and only use your information for the purposes explicitly stated in this policy.

items.personal: We collect information you provide directly, including your name, email, password (encrypted), native language, and language you wish to learn.
items.usage: We automatically collect information about how you access and use the Service, including interaction logs, IP address, and device type.
items.communication: To ensure safety and content moderation, we may record or analyze text messages and video/voice call logs.
items.payment: Payment information (e.g., credit card details) is processed by our secure payment partners and is not stored directly by PolyGo.

items.service: To operate and maintain the Service, including matching learners and managing communication events.
items.improvement: To understand how users use the Service and develop new features, products, and services.
items.ai: Some communication data (anonymized) may be used to train and improve our AI/Machine Learning models.
items.security: To prevent fraud, abuse, and other illegal activities, and to maintain the safety and integrity of the Service.

items.noThirdParty: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information with third parties for their own marketing purposes.
items.serviceProviders: We may share data with trusted third-party service providers (e.g., hosting, analytics) only as necessary for them to perform their functions.
items.legal: We may disclose your information if required to comply with the law or to respond to valid government requests.

items.access: You have the right to request copies of the personal data we hold about you.
items.edit: You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate or incomplete.
items.delete: You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, subject to our legal obligations.
items.export: You have the right to receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.

items.encryption: We use SSL/TLS encryption to protect data in transit and encrypt sensitive data (like passwords) at rest.
items.paymentSecurity: All payment transactions are handled by PCI DSS compliant payment gateways and are not processed on PolyGo's own servers.
items.accessControl: Access to user data is strictly limited to employees with a genuine business need.
items.monitoring: We continuously monitor our systems for vulnerabilities and potential attacks.

items.essential: These cookies are strictly necessary for you to navigate the website and use its features, such as accessing secure areas.
items.analytics: We use third-party cookies (like Google Analytics) to collect information about how you interact with our Service to improve performance.
items.management: You can manage or decline cookies in your browser settings, though this may affect the functionality of the Service.

items.duration: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy.
items.deletion: Upon account deletion, we will delete or anonymize your personal information, except for information we must retain due to legal obligations.
items.legal: Data may be retained for longer periods if required to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, or enforce our agreements.

items.ageLimit: PolyGo does not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. If you believe we have such information, please contact us.
items.protection: If we become aware that we have collected personal data from a child under 13 without verifiable parental consent, we will take steps to remove that information.

items.notification: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new Policy and updating the 'Last Updated' date.
items.acceptance: Your continued use of the Service after any changes become effective constitutes your acceptance of the revised Policy.

policy.footerNote: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us:
